title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1727 - Occupancy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1727 - Occupancy

State Regulations

Subpart 1727-1 - Tenant Selection Procedure (§ 1727-1.1 to 1727-1.5)

Subpart 1727-2 - Determination Of Eligibility For Admission Or Continued Occupancy (§ 1727-2.1 to 1727-2.8)

Subpart 1727-3 - Leasing And Tenancy (§ 1727-3.1 to 1727-3.11)

Subpart 1727-4 - Rent Determination And Collection (§ 1727-4.1 to 1727-4.13)

Subpart 1727-5 - Termination Of Tenancy (§ 1727-5.1 to 1727-5.3)

Subpart 1727-6 - Miscellaneous Provisions Of Tenancy (§ 1727-6.1 to 1727-6.3)

Subpart 1727-7 - Repealed

Subpart 1727-8 - Succession Requirements (§ 1727-8.1 to 1727-8.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1727

Statutory authority: Private Housing Finance Law, §§32, 32-a[6], 84; Public Housing Law, §19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
